docs.name: Dr. Abid Salahuddin
docs.about: He aced his Royal College exams and gained extensive experience across various pediatric fields, including critical care for newborns and children.

docs.name: Dr. Naveed Anwar
docs.about: Dr. Naveed Anwar (KMC '99) honed his medical skills before specializing in gastroenterology via PLAB and prestigious UK programs.

docs.name: Dr. Momin Salahuddin
